project.name: ItemMirror
project.description: ItemMirror: a library for working with XooML to promote open cross platform tool usage

FragmentEditor.name: FragmentEditor
FragmentEditor.description:
Constructs a FragmentWrapper for a XooML fragment. In the following cases. Case 1: xooMLFragmentString is given and is used as the XooMLFragment.
Case 2: associations, xooMLUtilityURI, itemUtilityURI, syncUtilityURI, groupingItemURI are given and used to create a new XooMLFragment with the given data. Throws NullArgumentException when options is null.
Throws MissingParameterException when options is not null and does not have the necessary arguments for any given case.
For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

params.name: options
params.description: Data to construct a new FragmentWrapper with

props.name: xooMLFragmentString
props.description:
XML string representing a XooML2
                  fragment. Required for case 1.

props.name: associations
props.description:
List of associations for
         the newly constructed XooMLFragment in case 2. Required in Case 2.

props.name: xooMLUtilityURI
props.description:
URI for the XooMLUtility for the
         newly constructed XooMLFragment in case 2. Required in Case 2.

props.name: itemUtilityURI
props.description:
URI for the ItemUtility for the
         newly constructed XooMLFragment in case 2. Required in Case 2.

props.name: syncUtilityURI
props.description:
URI for the SyncUtility for the
         newly constructed XooMLFragment in case 2. Required in Case 2.

props.name: groupingItemURI
props.description:
URI for the Grouping Item for the
         newly constructed XooMLFragment in case 2. Required in Case 2.

params.name: callback
params.description: callback function

props.name: error
props.description: The error to the callback

ItemDriver.name: ItemDriver
ItemDriver.description:
An item utility interacts with the item storage and is responsible for
creating and deleting items. This is an implementation of item utility
using Dropbox as the item storage.

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

params.name: options
params.description: Data to construct a new ItemU with

props.name: utilityURI
props.description: URI of the utility

props.name: dropboxClient
props.description: Authenticated dropbox client

ItemMirror.name: ItemMirror
ItemMirror.description:
ItemMirror represents an Item according to the XooML2 specification.

It can be instantiated using one of the following two cases based on the
given arguments.

1. XooMLFragment already exists. Given xooMLFragmentURI and xooMLDriver.
2. The XooMLFragment is created from an existing groupingItemURI.
Given a groupingItemURI, saveLocationURI. Optionally a itemDriver,
syncDriver, and a xooMLDriver can be supplied for the XooMLFragment.
3. Try case 1, and then fallback on case 2.

Throws NullArgumentException when options is null.

Throws MissingParameterException when options is not null and a required
argument is missing.

params.name: options
params.description: Data to construct a new ItemMirror with

props.name: groupingItemURI
props.description:
URI to the grouping item. Required
                 for all cases.

props.name: itemDriver
props.description:
Data for the ItemDriver to
                 construct ItemMirror with. Required for all cases.
                 Can contain any amount of optional key/value pairs for
                 the various Driver implementations.

props.name: driverURI
props.description: URI of the driver.

props.name: xooMLDriver
props.description:
Data for the XooMLDriver to
                 construct ItemMirror with. Required for all cases.
                 Can contain any amount of optional key/value pairs for
                 the various Driver implementations.

props.name: driverURI
props.description: URI of the driver.

props.name: syncDriver
props.description:
Data for the SyncDriver to
                 construct ItemMirror with. Required Case 2 & 3. Can
                 contain any amount of optional key/value pairs for
                 the various Driver implementations.

props.name: driverURI
props.description: URI of the driver.

props.name: readIfExists
props.description:
True if ItemMirror
                  should create an ItemMirror if it does not exist,
                  else false. Required for Case 2 & 3.

props.name: parent
props.description:
Parent ItemMirror of the ItemMirror
                     to be constructed. Optional.

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to execute once finished.

props.name: error
props.description:
Null if no error has occurred
                   in executing this function, else an contains
                   an object with the error that occurred.

props.name: itemMirror
props.description: Newly constructed ItemMirror

PathDriver.name: PathDriver
PathDriver.description:
A utility library for processing file paths. Handles any type of
file path so long as the separator is "/"

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

SyncDriver.name: SyncDriver
SyncDriver.description:
An implementation of SyncDriver which syncronizes the XooML so that
it reflects the storage. This implementation ensures that only the
XooML is modified, and that the user's storage is never modified,
safely protecting any data.

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

params.name: itemMirror
params.description:
The itemMirror object which you wish to
synchronize

XooMLAssociation.name: XooMLAssociation
XooMLAssociation.description:
XooMLAssociation is a minimal interface to represent a XooML2 association within a fragment. Throws NullArgumentException when GUID, name, or isUpgradeable is null.
Throws InvalidTypeException if GUID, or name is not a String and if isUpgradeable is not a boolean.
Throws InvalidGUIDException if GUID is not a valid GUID.
For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

params.name: GUID
params.description: GUID of the association.

params.name: isUpgradeable
params.description:
Boolean representing if the association
                 is upgradeable.

params.name: displayText
params.description: Display text of the association.

params.name: associatedItem
params.description: Associated item of the association.

XooMLConfig.name: XooMLConfig
XooMLConfig.description:
Configuration variables for XooML.js

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

XooMLDriver.name: XooMLDriver
XooMLDriver.description:
An XooML utility interacts with an storage and is responsible for
reading and writing XooML fragments. This is an implementation of XooML utility
using Dropbox as the storage.

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

params.name: options
params.description: Data to construct a new XooMLU with

props.name: utilityURI
props.description: URI of the utility

props.name: dropboxClient
props.description: Authenticated dropbox client

XooMLExceptions.name: XooMLExceptions
XooMLExceptions.description:
Collection of exceptions associated with the XooML tools.

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

XooMLUtil.name: XooMLUtil
XooMLUtil.description:
Collection of type checking, exception throwing, utility methods for the
XooML tools.

For ItemMirror core developers only. Enable protected to see.

classitems.description:
Returns URI pointing to item described by the metadata of a fragment. A URI
might point to just about anything that can be interpreted as a grouping
item. For example: a conventional file system folder or a “tag's
supported by any of several applications.

A URI pointing to item described by the metadata of a
                 fragment if it exists, else returns null.

classitems.description:
Returns the item driver. An item driver supports HTML5 filesystem API. self
driver must work hand in glove with SyncU. There is no exclusive control
over items as stored in the dataStore so need to view and synchronize.
Invoked directly to Open and Close. Delete, create. Invoked indirectly via
UI.
classitems.name: getItemDriver

classitems.description:
Sets the item driver. An item driver supports HTML5 filesystem API. self driver must work hand in glove with SyncU. There is no exclusive control over items as stored in the dataStore so need to view and synchronize. Invoked directly to Open and Close. Delete, create. Invoked indirectly via UI. Throws NullArgumentException if itemDriver is null.
Throws InvalidTypeException if itemDriver is not a String.

params.name: itemDriver
params.description: Item driver to be set.

classitems.description:
Creates an association based on the given options and the following cases. Case 1: Simple text association declared phantom.
Case 2: Link to existing non-grouping item, phantom.
Case 3: Link to existing non-grouping item, real.
Case 4: Link to existing grouping item, phantom.
Case 5: Link to existing grouping item, real.
Case 6: Create new local non-grouping item.
Case 7: Create new local grouping item.
Throws NullArgumentException when options, callback is null.
Throws InvalidTypeException when options is not an object and callback is not a function.
Throws MissingParameterException when an argument is missing for an expected case.
classitems.name: createAssociation

params.name: options
params.description: Data to create an new association for.

props.name: displayText.
props.description:
Display text for the association.
                  Required in all cases.

props.name: itemOrXooMLFragmentURI
props.description:
URI of the item or
                  XooMLFragment depending on the case. Required for
                  cases 2, 3, 4 & 5.

props.name: localItemRequested
props.description:
True if the local item is
                  requested, else false. Required for cases 2, 3, 4, & 5.

props.name: xooMLDriverURI
props.description:
URI of the XooML driver for the
                  association. Required for cases 4 & 5.

props.name: itemName
props.description:
Name of the new local
                  non-grouping/grouping item. Required for cases 6 & 7.

props.name: itemType
props.description:
Type of the new local
                  non-grouping/grouping item. Required for case 6.

return.description: GUID of the newly created association.

classitems.description:
Returns URI pointing to item described by the metadata of a fragment. A URI
might point to just about anything that can be interpreted as a grouping
item. For example: a conventional file system folder or a “tag as
supported by any of several applications.

A URI pointing to item described by the metadata
of a fragment if it exists, else returns null.

classitems.description:
An item driver supports HTML5 filesystem API. self driver must
work hand in glove with SyncU. There is no exclusive control over
items as stored in the dataStore so need to view and synchronize.
Invoked directly to Open and Close. Delete, create. Invoked
indirectly via UI.

Returns the sync driver URI.

classitems.description:
Creates an ItemMirror from the associated grouping item represented by the given GUID. Throws NullArgumentException if GUID or callback is null.
Throws InvalidTypeException if GUID is not a string, and callback is not a function.
Throws InvalidGUIDException if GUID is not a valid GUID.
classitems.name: createItemMirrorForAssociatedGroupingItem

return.description: Possibly return an itemMirror if the GUID is a grouping item

params.name: GUID
params.description:
GUID of the association to create the ItemMirror
                from.

classitems.description:
Creates an association based on the given options and the following cases. Cases 1, 2, 7 implemented. All else are not implemented. 1. Simple text association declared phantom.
2. Link to existing non-grouping item, phantom. This can be a URL
3. Link to existing non-grouping item, real.
4. Link to existing grouping item, phantom.
5. Link to existing grouping item, real.
6. Create new local non-grouping item.
7. Create new local grouping item.
Throws NullArgumentException when options, or callback is null.
Throws InvalidTypeException when options is not an object and callback is not a function.
Throws MissingParameterException when an argument is missing for an expected case.
classitems.name: createAssociation

params.name: options
params.description: Data to create an new association for.

props.name: displayText
props.description:
Display text for the association.
                  Required in all cases.

props.name: itemURI
props.description: URI of the item. Required for case 2 & 3. Note: Please ensure "http://" prefix exists at the beginning of the string when referencing a Web URL and not an Item.

props.name: localItemRequested
props.description:
True if the local item is
                  requested, else false. Required for cases 2 & 3.

props.name: groupingItemURI
props.description:
URI of the grouping item.
                  Required for cases 4 & 5.

props.name: xooMLDriverURI
props.description:
URI of the XooML driver for the
                  association. Required for cases 4 & 5.

props.name: itemName
props.description:
URI of the new local
                  non-grouping/grouping item. Required for cases 6 & 7.

props.name: isGroupingItem
props.description:
True if the item is a grouping
                  item, else false. Required for cases 6 & 7.

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to execute once finished.

props.name: error
props.description:
Null if no error has occurred
                   in executing this function, else an contains
                   an object with the error that occurred.

props.name: GUID
props.description: GUID of the association created.

classitems.description:
Upgrades a given association without a local item. Local item is named by a truncated form of the display name of this ItemMirror if the localItemURI is not given, else uses given localItemURI. Always truncated to 50 characters. ONLY SUPPORTS SIMPLE PHANTOM ASSOCIATION TO ASSOCIATION WITH GROUPING ITEM Throws NullArgumentException when options is null.
Throws MissingParameterException when options is not null and a required argument is missing.
Throws InvalidTypeException if GUID is not a string, and if callback is not a function.
Throws InvalidState if the association with the given GUID cannot be upgraded.

                 Optional.

classitems.description: Checks if the AssociatedItem String passed into it is a URL or not.
classitems.name: _isURL

return.description:
True if it is an HTTP URL, false otherwise
(HTTPS will fail)

classitems.description: Takes two paths and joins them together.
classitems.name: joinPath

return.description: The two joined paths

params.name: root
params.description: The root path to join

params.name: leaf
params.description: The leaf path to join

classitems.description:
Takes an array of paths and joins them all together.

Currently unimplemented and throws notImplemented exception if
called.
classitems.name: joinPathArrays

classitems.description:
Splits a path into an array of the different folders in that
path; including the root if present.
classitems.name: splitPath

return.description: An array of split up paths

params.name: path
params.description: The path to be split

classitems.description: Formats a path by removing any trailing slashes.
classitems.name: formatPath

return.description: The well formatted path

params.name: path
params.description: The path to be formatted

classitems.name: isRoot

return.description: True if root, false otherwise

params.name: path
params.description: Path to test for root

example:
format('/');
    // returns true, anything else will return false

return.description: The character that is used as a path separator
The path without any trailing slash
The path without any leading slash

classitems.description: Synchonizes the itemMirror object.
classitems.name: sync

params.name: callback
params.description: Function to execute once finished.

props.name: error
props.description:
Null if no error has occurred
                   in executing this function, else an contains
                   an object with the error that occurred.

classitems.description: Returns a boolean representing if this XooMLAssociation is a grouping item.
classitems.name: getIsGroupingItem

return.description:
True if this XooMLAssociation is a grouping item
                  else returns false.

classitems.description: Returns the display text of this association.
classitems.name: getDisplayText

return.description: The display text of this association.

classitems.description: Constructs a XooMLDriver for reading/writing XooML fragment.
Reads and returns a XooML fragment
classitems.name: getXooMLFragment

params.name: uri
params.description: the location of the XooML fragment

params.name: callback(content)
params.description: Function to be called when self function is finished with it's operation. content is the content of the XooML fragment.

classitems.description: Writes a XooML fragment
classitems.name: setXooMLFragment

params.name: uri
params.description: the location of the XooML fragment

params.name: fragment
params.description: the content of the XooML fragment

params.name: callback(content)
params.description: Function to be called when self function is finished with it's operation. content is the content of the XooML fragment.

classitems.description: Check if the XooML fragment is existed
classitems.name: checkExisted

params.name: uri
params.description: the location of the XooML fragment

params.name: callback(result)
params.description: Function to be called when self function is finished with it's operation. Result is the bollean value for whether existed.

classitems.description: Thrown when a method is not yet implemented.
classitems.name: NotImplementedException

classitems.description: Thrown when a required property from a method's options is missing.
classitems.name: MissingParameterException

classitems.description:
Thrown when an argument is given a null value when it does not accept null
values.
classitems.name: NullArgumentException

classitems.description:
Thrown when an argument is given a value with a different type from the
expected type.
classitems.name: InvalidTypeException

classitems.description:
Thrown when an a method is called when the object is in invalid state
given what the method expected.
classitems.name: InvalidStateArgument

classitems.description: Thrown after receiving an exception from XooMLU Storage
classitems.name: XooMLUException

classitems.description: Thrown after receiving an exception from ItemU Storage
classitems.name: ItemUException

classitems.description: Thrown after an association was upgraded that could not be upgraded.
classitems.name: NonUpgradeableAssociationException

classitems.description: Thrown after an argument was passed in an invalid state than expected.
classitems.name: InvalidArgumentException

classitems.description: Thrown after expecting a file or folder not to exist when it does.
classitems.name: FileOrFolderAlreadyExistsException

classitems.description: Thrown when expecting the ItemMirror to be current, and it is not.
classitems.name: FileOrFolderAlreadyExistsException

classitems.description:
Checks if each option within the given checkedOptions is a property of
the given options.
classitems.name: hasOptions

params.name: checkedOptions
params.description: Array of strings for each expected option.

params.name: options
params.description: Options given to a function.

classitems.description: Returns if the given value is an array. Throws NullArgumentException when value is null.
classitems.name: isArray

params.name: value
params.description: Given object have it's type checked.

classitems.description: Returns if the given value is an object. Throws NullArgumentException when value is null.
classitems.name: isObject

params.name: value
params.description: Given object have it's type checked.

return.description: True if the given value is an Object, else false.

classitems.description: Returns if the given value is an function. Throws NullArgumentException when value is null.
classitems.name: isFunction

params.name: value
params.description: Given object have it's type checked.

return.description: True if the given value is a Function, else false.

classitems.description: Returns if the given value is an string. Throws NullArgumentException when value is null.
classitems.name: isString

params.name: value
params.description: Given object have it's type checked.

return.description: True if the given value is a String, else false.

classitems.description: Generates a GUID.
classitems.name: generateGUID

return.description: Randomly generated GUID.
